name: ceiled
description: Server and web interface for LEDs on ceiling
author: Bart van Oort

scripts.install: concurrently "cd controller && yarn install" "cd ceiled-web && yarn install "
scripts.start: concurrently "cd controller && yarn start" "cd ceiled-web && yarn serve"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd controller && yarn build" "cd ceiled-web && yarn build "
